phases.description: A column of smoke rises above a row of ruined homes, the heat still radiating across the street. Somewhere deeper inside, someone screams for help. Flames still lick along collapsed beams, and the air tastes of ash.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} leads a cautious approach, staying low and scanning for structural danger
{SURVIVOR2} calls out, hoping the survivor can guide them without entering the worst of the fire
Avoid the burning block entirely — the risks outweigh the reward

phases.description: Deeper in the ruined street, two possible leads emerge: a collapsed storm shelter with faint movement below, and a pinned survivor trapped beneath fallen timber. Smoke swirls low across the ground.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} inspects the collapsed storm shelter, listening for whoever might be trapped inside
{SURVIVOR2} rushes to free the pinned survivor, using leverage and speed

phases.description: The fire spreads rapidly. Heat waves shimmer off the pavement and a section of roof collapses behind them, showering sparks through the air.

choices.text: Retreat quickly with whatever supplies they recovered
{SURVIVOR1} and {SURVIVOR2} attempt a final rescue sprint before the flames cut off the path completely

phases.description: A highway tunnel ahead is partially collapsed, debris scattered across lanes. Vehicles lie crushed along the walls and faint groans echo from deeper inside. The air is stale, thick with dust.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} ({ROLE1_CAP}) checks the tunnel’s stability from a safe distance
{SURVIVOR2} ({ROLE2_CAP}) inspects the debris for a possible safe route
Push forward blindly into the tunnel, hoping luck holds

phases.description: Inside the tunnel, dust filters through beams of dying light. Two possible paths lie ahead — a narrow crawlspace above a fallen truck, or a dark, stagnant-water underpass beneath the wreck.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} climbs into the upper crawlspace, pulling debris aside as quietly as possible
{SURVIVOR2} wades through the lower path, feeling for footing beneath murky water

phases.description: The tunnel groans ominously. Dust trickles from above as another collapse threatens. A massive barrier of debris blocks the exit.

choices.text: Force through the debris before the tunnel gives way
Detour through a side maintenance corridor

phases.description: A long line of FEMA trucks stretches across the roadside. Doors hang open, paperwork litters the ground, and supply crates lie scattered like someone left in a hurry.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} ({ROLE1_CAP}) secures the perimeter before anyone gets too close
Approach the convoy slowly, checking for movement between the trucks
Leave the convoy untouched and move on

phases.description: The interior of the convoy shows signs of both order and chaos — sealed crates beside ripped-open ones, and tracks in the dust that lead nowhere.

choices.text: Search unopened crates carefully
{SURVIVOR2} checks the trucks’ tanks for usable fuel

phases.description: At the head of the convoy waits a battered communications truck. Its door hangs crooked, metal warped and paint blistered by heat.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} climbs into the comms truck to search for supplies or intel
Back away before the situation becomes more dangerous
